item.title: Welcome to the Indian Kodi setup!
Turn on auto-updates to stay on the latest and most stable Indian Kodi plugins!
We've updated the YouTube addon with more features and our own API! If you have any problems let us know!
Our skin has entered the BETA stage for Kodi 16.0 or Jarvis.. Send us your feedback about any bugs or issues at: indiankodi@gmail.com
